statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, timestamp FROM supplier_lead_times ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, timestamp FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_id FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND lead_time < 10 ORDER BY lead_time ASC
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM supplier_lead_times GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_leads > 5 ORDER BY total_leads DESC
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(lead_time) AS max_lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY max_lead_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE lead_time = 7 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, last_updated FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT delivery_id, delay_reason FROM delivery_delays WHERE delay_duration < 10;
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times JOIN delivery_delays ON supplier_lead_times.supplier_id = delivery_delays.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM supplier_lead_times WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY lead_time ASC;

SELECT * FROM supplier_lead_times INNER JOIN delivery_delays ON supplier_lead_times.supplier_id = delivery_delays.supplier_id WHERE supplier_lead_times.lead_time < 3 ORDER BY supplier_lead_times.supplier_id DESC, delivery_delays.delay_duration ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(delivery_id) FROM delivery_delays GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(delivery_id) > 2;

SELECT supplier_id, delay_reason FROM supplier_lead_times LEFT JOIN delivery_delays ON supplier_lead_times.supplier_id = delivery_delays.supplier_id AND delivery_delays.delay_duration > 10 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, delivery_delays.delay_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryDelays WHERE delay_duration > 5;
SELECT delivery_id, delay_reason FROM DeliveryDelays WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT production_id, delay_cause FROM ProductionDelays;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, MAX(lead_time) AS max_lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT dd.delivery_id, dd.delay_reason, dd.delay_duration, st.lead_time FROM DeliveryDelays dd INNER JOIN SupplierLeadTimes st ON dd.supplier_id = st.supplier_id;
SELECT pd.delay_cause, COUNT(pd.delay_cause) AS delay_count FROM ProductionDelays pd GROUP BY pd.delay_cause ORDER BY delay_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, lead_time_timestamp FROM SupplierLeadTimes LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM DeliveryDelays WHERE cause = 'Weather';
SELECT supplier_id, delay_minutes FROM DeliveryDelays WHERE delay_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM SupplierInfo WHERE contact_phone IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(delay_minutes) AS total_delay FROM DeliveryDelays GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_delay > 1000;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, historical_date FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT supplier_id, contact_name, contact_email FROM SupplierContacts ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, production_date FROM ProductionDelays WHERE delay_days < 3 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierLocations WHERE location_name LIKE '%HQ%';
SELECT * FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE lead_time > 5;
SELECT supplier_id, lead_time, historical_date FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, delay_days, delivery_date FROM DeliveryDelays ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, contact_name, contact_email FROM SupplierContacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT supplier_id, location_name, location_address FROM SupplierLocations JOIN SupplierLeadTimes ON SupplierLocations.supplier_id = SupplierLeadTimes.supplier_id ORDER BY location_name ASC;
